ValidationRule.description: Validation rule prevents a user from updating the Main Billing Contact field from not blank to blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISCHANGED( Main_Billing_Contact__c ) && PRIORVALUE( Main_Billing_Contact__c ) != NULL && Main_Billing_Contact__c = NULL
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Main Billing Contact cannot be removed without selecting a new Main Billing Contact
